synopsis.text:
Shizukuishi Ai, a reserved middle school student with average academic performance, harbors a hidden talent and a secret. Under the guise of a boy, she uploads captivating dance videos on the popular platform 'Smile Douga,' earning herself viral fame. With a burning desire to outshine the acclaimed 'dancing prince,' Hayate, Ai's life takes an unexpected turn when her cross-dressing performances catch the attention of a talent agency.

Thrust into the limelight as part of an all-male idol group alongside her rival, Hayate, Ai must navigate the complexities of her newfound career while maintaining her disguise. As they share living quarters per the agency's rules, their rivalry intensifies, and Hayate begins to unravel Ai's secret. To further complicate matters, he finds himself inexplicably drawn to her, adding a romantic twist to their competitive dynamic. Will Ai succeed in her quest to outshine Hayate, or will her secret jeopardize everything she's worked for? Join Ai and Hayate as they dance their way through challenges, self-discovery, and unexpected romance in this thrilling anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
